text: Okay, welcome to module one, the learning objectives, outcome, and methodology. It is so critically important to have a very solid foundation in how you're going to learn. Because without that solid foundation of your learning process, then you will have an inability to record the price ladder patterns that we train you on, not only the ones but the ability for you to develop yourself as your own unique order flow price ladder trader because a very solid foundation, very solid method of providing yourself a feedback how to recall patterns and therefore deploy the right price ladder trading strategies to optimize your risk versus reward management in executing your trades. And what's so important is the cognitive ability for you to recall patterns that you have learned and how to deploy them as quickly as possible when you faced and you trading in the financial market landscape.
